text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Thurs 29 April, 2,445 new cases & 22 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

34,094,048 people have now received the first dose of a #vaccine. 14,043,961 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/aLQrwqeMiz
